Minibar Delivery - New York, NY https://minibardelivery.com

We are hiring Ruby and Data Engineers. Come join our team and help us revolutionize on-demand e-commerce. Send resumes to chris@minibardelivery.com.

Full details: https://minibardelivery.com/careers

About Us: Minibar is a mobile-first platform providing consumers with on-demand access to wine, liquor, beer, mixers and more. Launched in February 2014, Minibar provides users with an easy and hassle-free way to stock their spirits. Minibar was founded by two Wharton graduates with rich experience in the NY tech scene. We are looking for smart and passionate go-getters to join our team and get in on the ground floor.
